mapper.select: select u.email, u.name, a.remainday from( select username as userid, datediff(day, convert(date, getdate()), dateadd(year, 1, max(convert(date, case when date_of_review is null then request_date else date_of_review end)))) remainday FROM el_training_record_review where status in('REQUEST', 'REVIEWED') group by username ) a left join account u on a.userid = u.user_id where remainday in(21, 14, 7, 3, 1) and u.enabled = 1 and u.user_type = 'U'

select * from ( select email, indate, dateadd(week, 8, convert(date, indate)) week8, user_id as userId, name, datediff(day, convert(date, getdate()), dateadd(week, 8, convert(date, indate))) remainDay from account where enabled = 1 and dateadd(week, 8, convert(date, indate)) > getdate() and convert(date, indate) >= convert(date, '2020-03-01') and user_type = 'U' and user_id not in(select distinct username from el_training_record_review) ) a where remainDay in(7, 3, 1)

with temp as ( select user_id, parent_user_id from account where parent_user_id = #{parentUserid} and user_id <> 'khkim' and enabled = 1 union all select b.user_id, b.parent_user_id from temp a inner join account b on b.parent_user_id = a.user_id and b.parent_user_id is not null and b.enabled = 1 ) select user_id from temp option(maxrecursion 5);
